original_title: Otto Jespersen: Stolt, Hvit og Vanskelig
overview: The grand opening of Otto Jespersens show "Proud, White and Difficult" at Smuget in Oslo received praise from the critics. VG and Dagbladet rolled 5 on the dice, and the norwegian people demanded that the show got out on the road. After an amazing tour the show is finally available on DVD in its entirety!
title: Otto Jespersen: Stolt, Hvit og Vanskelig
